7.4. 定时任务

@File : tasks.py @Author : niuxingjie @Time : 2022/3/15 17:37 @Description :

样例：

import datetime from client.tasks import unconfirmed_open_accept_job, unconfirmed_transfer_accept_job from client.models.credit_certificate import CreditCertificate from utils.date_and_time import n_minutes_later

cc_id = 23 cc=CreditCertificate.objects.get(pk=cc_id) now=datetime.datetime.now()

res=unconfirmed_open_accept_job.apply_async(args=(cc_id, str(cc.expire_at)), eta=n_minutes_later(now, 1)) res.get() res.status
